ygData.subject: Re: Following Megatrons troops.
ygData.msgSnippet: Looking on the scanners, Tarantulas notices that the large, mysterious bot, Megaton is heading this way. Megatron, um, First off, Darkmouse refused our offer

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Looking on the scanners, Tarantulas notices that the large, mysterious 
bot, Megaton is heading this way.
       "Megatron, um, First off, Darkmouse refused our offer and now Megaton 
is coming this way." He said, looking at the dictator in his throne.
       "Instruct Quickstrike.....oh wait, he left....tell Paddletail to try 
and make some Liquid Energon himself. I believe we have the recipie around 
here somewhere. As for Megaton....Waspinator, Myself, and Aerostreak will 
talk with him." Megatron said, getting up.
       Waspinator, Aerostreak, and Megatron all exit the Ice Cave and 
approach Megaton.

--part1_13.f162302.277395bd_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
